title: Why the hell does Fiora's riposte have an attack speed slow?
body:
Even if she doesn't repel cc with it, she still slows your attack speed when she hits you. Why is this a thing? As if trying to fight through her kassadin ult on a basic ability, low mana costs and max HP true damage Janna ult wasn't bad enough, she has an anti-carry mechanic in her kit as well? 

This needs to be removed, there's absolutely no reason for this to be a thing

Yeah, it only cost 40 mana at max rank with 115% bonus AD scaling (which I admit isn't a ton all things considered but she doesn't need it). It will also prioritize vitals. And it has 400 range. So all things considered, with 40% CDR and landing a lunge on an opponent, it's cooldown is 2 seconds. It's literally just as good as kassadins ult in almost every way except the stacking damage but in exchange it doesn't have a huge stacking mana cost. 

Let's keep in mind with all this, we are comparing a basic ability to an ultimate.

Lets keep in mind here that this is a single target attack, it is literally just an aimed auto attack with some buffs attatched. Lets also keep in mind here her ult is literally just multiplying her passive and her E is nothing but an auto attack buff. 
I think her Q can be a little overloaded.
